comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: OP, I welcome you to this forum, this place with my little knowledge is where people from different work of life gather to discuss Bitcoin mainly, other alternative currency, fiat, and the economy of the world large, but I must testify that, to learn here depend on the individual that is involved, as you know, learning is a process that you have to be patience with, it is not something you have to rush, be a good reader, go through what has already been discussed, check people comment on a particular thread and learn from them, bitcoin is mainly why we are here as I said earlier but that should deprive you other knowledge you can get here too, but most importantly you have to identify why you are here, after that, you set a goal that has to be achieved by you if only you can concentrate and make yourself available when needed.Criticism will come, but see it as part of the process and learn from it, everyone here was criticized in one way or another but they didn't give up on bringing their suggestions and opinions, just feel free to ask questions people are here to answer you, I wish you a successful stay here, you are welcome once more.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: I also welcome you to the board in particular and to the forum in general. The forum is easy to navigate and you need to understand the terms and conditions of the local board and the general rules. And one thing you need to know and do is that you have to read more than posting. Okay, see what you will do, always read other people threads and comments and in the process of reading these threads, any one you understand, you made a comment and the ones you don't understand you leave. That is the first step to develop yourself in the forum.  You registered am last yr and u abandoned di account. Many people like you e full dis place, and di only thing to do to over come those kind of things na to pick courage and be active.Many of us we dey here like dis na so we been dey but as we dey active dey read other people writings, na we come dey master di forum. and another thing you will do is to ask question when dont knw.  I know say weti make you give up before because u no know weti to tok about as u no come get di knowledge of bitcoin. And you also need to know dat dis forum na to discuss bitcoin so equip yourself on that.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.created_time: November 27, 2023, 04:46:22 AMLast edit: November 27, 2023, 02:17:17 PM by DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: You're welcome OP, you know what OP means?. It means original poster/postmaker. The forum might look very big and intimidating to you, everyone felt that way in the beginning. You're not very new to the forum, but you're new to engaging in the forum, I've seen that some wise members have given you the list of plenty rules to digest, but I'll try to make things simpler for you. Anywhere you find yourself, try to abide by the rules cos that determines the  duration of your comfortable stay in that place and this form is not  an exception to that theorem. Non compliance to rules here meets dire consequences which you'll not like to face and I'll not like you to be in that predicament too. There's lots of rules, but to me, there some basic rules you just need to observe to play safe and they're as follows:Plagiarism: do not copy and paste  contents from Internet without giving credit to the source. Giving credit to the source is as simple as just putting the link to the website you got the content. Failure to do this, your account will be banned and you'll loose all your hard work. I'll also mention to you that you can get image from any source  to support your post and not provide its link as such is not viewed as plagiarismSpamming: Do Not create threads that has been created before in the forum, before you create Any thread, use the search navigation, google, or Ninjastic.space to verify the existence of such topic in the respective board. If it exists, just take your idea as a reply to the post, if it doesn't exist, you can go ahead to create the thread.Burst Posting: don't  post in succession to yourself. if after replying a thread, and you've another quality reply to someone else's post when no one have posted after you, you can just edit your post and quote the person carefully in your previous reply. Yes, you can quote and reply different people at a time.Use of AI: The Forum encourages intuition and  crafting out your posts from your head. but it frowns on the use of AI to  create threads, or reply to threads as such is seen as laziness and can get your account  banned or tagged. Don't even try to be smart cos there are smarter tools to catch you. The best is to avoid it at all costs. These I've always had in mind and it has helped me to playe safe and engage more in the forum activities and it surely pays off.You also need to make quality posts and contributions and here's how to go about it:Keep reading and learning the patterns that older members adhere to while making posts in the forum and how they make points in their posting. Keep learning and you'll pick up enough experience to engage profitably in the forum. Do not chase merits, or else you'll be disappointed, chase knowledge instead and merits will flow as a reward for knowledge gained and your quality contributions to the forum.

comments.author: Justbillywitt
comments.body: My broda you are welcome to the Naija board. Me personally dey happy to see you for this place. This shows that the Naija local board don gain new member. I believe say the person wey you say tell you about this place supposed don tell you the basic rules of the forum. But me I go just tell you say make you dey original for anything wey you dey talk for the forum. The forum no dey like 'plagiarism' at all point. Also make you no dey use AI tool dey post for here, this forum no dey like those kind things. And you must devote your time to reading and gaining knowledge only this way you fit get meaning something to contribute to the group. I know by now you have read about the beginner and help. Just make use of those things you read from there, but if you have not I will encourage you to do so. Another thing wey I go encourage you be say make you no dey in a hurry to create a thread of your own instead focus more of your energy in reading and contributing your own idea or opinion in already existing topics or threads that are already created in the forum. As a new you must also be willing to learn and take instructions, this is very important for your growth in this place.
